name: Sky Force (itch)
description:
Sky Force is an incredible endless runner in which you need to fly  faster.

  Control your plane and survive for as long as you can while dodging obstacles and collecting points to increase your score .

Game Features:-

* Easy game play. Just control the airplane through the game while avoiding the obstacle coming in your way!

* Simple Mechanics. Just Tap and Fly

* Beautiful music

* Various bonuses
